word: God promises that if we will separate ourselves from the world, He will receive us, and will be a Father unto us, and we shall be His sons and daughters. Shall we not separate ourselves from the world, and claim this sacred relationship now, that when our Father comes He may acknowledge us as His children?--Ms 71, 1903, p. 5. ("To Every Man His Work," E. G. White talk, June 18, 1903.)
